body.name: Gold Bond Healing Hydrating Lotion, 20 oz., With Aloe, Moisturizes, Immediate 24-Hour Hydration
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 1 hr 20 mins
features: Includes one (1) 20-oz. pump bottle of Gold Bond Healing Lotion With Aloe
Gold Bond Lotion hydrates with 7 moisturizers and 3 nourishing vitamins
Gold Bond Healing Lotion softens and nourishes for healthy-looking skin
This Gold Bond Lotion has been tested by dermatologists and is hypoallergenic
This nongreasy body lotion is quick-absorbing and has a fresh, clean scent
Create a TerraCycle account and start recycling your empty Gold Bond packaging
body.description: Hydrate and nourish dry skin for a full 24 hours with Gold Bond Healing Hydrating Lotion. This daily moisturizer with aloe has a fresh, clean scent and provides long-lasting moisture for skin that looks and feels noticeably healthier. Gold Bond Healing Lotion is made with seven intensive moisturizers and three vitamins, including vitamin B to help improve the appearance of skin, antioxidant vitamin C to protect against environmental stressors, and vitamin E to help prevent moisture loss. The Gold Bond Healing formula is nongreasy, hypoallergenic and dermatologist-tested for everyday use. Use it on hands and body to moisturize, heal and smooth dry skin.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Clinically Proven Healing Hydration For All Your Skins Hand Cream Dry or rough hands? Put an end to it with Gold Bond Healing Hand Cream. It’s formulated with soothing aloe, plus 7 intense moisturizers and 3 essential vitamins to give hands the deep moisture they need. This hand cream even lasts through handwashing. Body Lotion Introducing the rich hydration your skin’s been waiting for: Gold Bond Healing Lotion. This Gold Bond lotion delivers intense hydration that lasts for 24 hours. Best of all, the nongreasy formula absorbs quickly. Foot Cream Kick your heels up! Gold Bond Healing Foot Cream intensely moisturizes dry, tough feet. The deep moisturizing formula is made with 7 intense moisturizers and 3 essential vitamins to make dry, rough heels soft and smooth.

Your Triple Threat for Nourishing Dry, Rough Skin 24-Hour Moisture Gold Bond Healing products are made with a blend of hydrating ingredients that draw moisture throughout the day to give you 24 hours of nourishing moisture. Nourishing Ingredients Every Gold Bond Healing formula is made with a triple vitamin blend that includes vitamin B to help improve the appearance of skin, vitamin C to protect against environmental stressors and vitamin E to help minimize moisture loss. Soothing Aloe Dry, rough skin can feel uncomfortable. That’s why Gold Bond Healing Lotion, Hand Cream, and Foot Cream contain aloe to soothe and hydrate skin.

SEE IT NOW SEE IT NOW SEE IT NOW SEE IT NOW SEE IT NOW Form Body Lotion Hand Cream Foot Cream Body Lotion Body Lotion Why You’ll Love It Provides 24-hour hydration Lightweight, nongreasy formula absorbs quickly and lasts through handwashing Conditions and nourishes dry, rough feet and heels Works through the night to wake up to skin that looks rejuvenated and healthy Specially formulated for men’s extra-dry skin, it hydrates, nourishes and smoothes skin Dermatologist Tested ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Almost Perfect Skin Hydration, with Just a Tiny Quirk 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟
reviews.reviewText: The Gold Bond Healing Hydrating Lotion, specifically the 14 oz. variant, is truly a phenomenal product in terms of effectiveness and overall quality. From its impressive hydrating properties to the addition of soothing aloe, this lotion addresses multiple skin care needs in one package.One of the best things about this product is its ability to provide sustained 24-hour hydration. In a world of skincare products that make grandiose claims, Gold Bond delivers on this promise. One application a day keeps my skin feeling supple and soft all day long. The immediate hydration effect is visible from the get-go, and my skin texture has noticeably improved since I started using this lotion.The aloe inclusion deserves a special mention. It provides a soothing effect that’s like a salve to my sensitive skin. Its healing benefits are evident on those troublesome dry patches that seem to resist other products. I’ve seen marked improvement since using this lotion, which is a testament to its healing power.Now, while I can’t help but sing praises, there is a slight caveat. The fragrance, while pleasant and mild, may not be everyone’s cup of tea. It doesn’t bother me, but it is noticeable enough that if you’re not a fan of scented lotions, you might have to weigh that aspect against the undeniable benefits of this product.Even though the lotion is packed with hydrating properties, it doesn’t leave an oily or greasy feeling on the skin. It absorbs fairly quickly, which is always a good thing, especially for people who don’t have much time to spare in their skincare routine.The packaging is solid, and I particularly appreciate the pump, which dispenses the lotion easily. The 14 oz. size is pretty generous, ensuring that you get a decent run out of a single purchase. It might seem a bit pricey, but considering the benefits and the long-lasting nature of the product, it’s a worthy investment.All in all, the Gold Bond Healing Hydrating Lotion with Aloe is a superb product. While the fragrance might not appeal to everyone, the undeniable hydrating and healing benefits it offers make it a five-star contender in my book. It’s become a mainstay in my daily skincare routine, and I believe anyone who values quality skincare would appreciate it.Thank you for taking the time to read my review. I hope it helps you in making an informed choice. Wishing you the best of luck in your skincare journey, and may you find your ideal product. Happy moisturizing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 100% perfection in a product...
reviews.reviewText: Gold Bond Healing Hydration Lotion absolutely works, and works quickly. I first used it on my feet, that had been very cracked, rough and dry. After 24 hours, I noticed such a significant improvement, no more dry and rough feet, that I now use it on my feet and lower legs below the knee, and on my hands and arms up to my elbow. And if I plan to go outside in the cold weather, put it on my face. Makes your skin look and feel wonderful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Ive always liked Goldbond lotions and I've used this one and off for some time. The consistency is thick but it isn't difficult to work into the skin and it doesn't leave my skin feeling greasy or gross.it's very moisturizing and my skin feels very soft after using this. I like to use it all over my body and it keeps me feeling moisturized and smooth ! The best thing is that the bottle is HUGE

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love the lotion, not so much the pump
reviews.reviewText: I've used this lotion for years and like the moisturizing effect.However, when the bottle is 1/2 to 2/3 empty, the pump stops working. It won't budge!Not happy about that. I would change the pump from a new unopened bottle to the onestill in use, but then when I was into the new bottle, the pump stops working again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best lotion. Period.
reviews.reviewText: I have tried many, many lotions and creams over the years, but nothing works as well as Goldbond. It’s the most moisturizing and lasts the longest, and it smells nice too without being overbearing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent lotion. Best of the best.
reviews.reviewText: The very best hand lotion anywhere. Very thick, works great, lasts for hours, a little goes a long ways. Definitely not diluted down like so many of these products on the market. Our old favorite brand that we used to use feels like water compared to this. The only problem is that since it is so thick, a lot of product gets stuck at the bottom of the container when it’s getting low and will not pump out. We cut it open and scoop it out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect lotion for dry skin
reviews.reviewText: This lotion works. I have dry skin and this worked. It is an old fashioned brand, but it is great. I understand why this company is still in business.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best hand cream I’ve found
reviews.reviewText: I’m a house cleaner so my hands are wrecked by the end of the day. At night I rub this into my hands/elbows and they come back to life. Not too sticky and rubs in nicely. I even keep the small squeeze bottle in my car for emergencies
La piel la deja terza y humectada por todo el dia, cumple lo que dice e hidrata la piel seca

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: DOES WHAT IT STATES ,WILL CONTINUE TO BUY THIS PRODUCT ,TOLD PEOPLE TO BUY IT. GREAT FOR SORE HANDS.
Started using it when abroad, found it a good moisturizer. Now continue to use it
Seit vielen Jahren nutze ich die Gold Bond. Früher habe ich diese immer in den USA gekauft und bin happy, dass ich sie mittlerweile auch hier erhalte. Für mich einfach die beste Hand- und Fußcreme
ma lotion pour le corps préférée . il rend ma peau trés lisse et belle.
